InstallationÂ¶

Install via pip:

pip install django-ccfiletypes

Once installed you will need to add it to your settings.INSTALLED_APPS:

INSTALLED_APPS = (
    ...
    'ccfiletypes',
)

Finally you will need to run the collectstatic command to get the icon files into your static root:

python manage.py collectstatic
